data.title: Songs written by John Denver
data.meta_description: John Denver covered Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas, On the Atcheson, Topeka and the Santa Fe, Gravel on the Ground, How Mountain Girls Can Love and other songs. John Denver originally did How Mountain Girls Can Love, Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas, Gravel on the Ground, A Country Girl in Paris and other songs. John Denver wrote Take Me Home, Country Roads, Leaving on a Jet Plane and The Eagle and the Hawk.
data.text:
Discover The Original

SecondHandSongs is building the most comprehensive source of cover song information.
